.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-example-title

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_testing_external_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls.py:


Scored Test (Classification)
========================================================
Testing External Models without Model Objects as Input

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-10

Assume we have models fitted outside PiML workflow

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 10-22

.. code-block:: default

    import numpy as np
    from xgboost import XGBClassifier
    from sklearn.datasets import make_circles
    from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

    x, y = make_circles(n_samples=2000, noise=0.1, random_state=0)
    train_x, test_x, train_y, test_y, train_idx, test_idx = train_test_split(x, y,
                                                                             np.arange(x.shape[0]), test_size=0.2)

    xgb2 = XGBClassifier(max_depth=2, n_estimators=100)
    xgb2.fit(train_x, train_y)






.. raw:: html

    <div class="output_subarea output_html rendered_html output_result">

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-24

Prepare the data for testing 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 24-44

.. code-block:: default

    random_state = 0
    target_name = "target"
    task_type = 'classification'
    feature_names = ["X1", "X2"]
    feature_types = ["numerical", "numerical"] # "categorical" or "numerical"
    prediction = xgb2.predict(x)
    prediction_proba = xgb2.predict_proba(x)[:, 1]

    data_params = {'x': x,
                   'y': y,
                   'prediction': prediction,
                   'prediction_proba': prediction_proba,
                   'feature_names': feature_names,
                   'feature_types': feature_types,
                   'target_name': target_name,
                   'train_idx': train_idx,
                   'test_idx': test_idx,
                   'task_type': task_type,
                   'random_state': random_state}








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 45-46

Show the accuracy table 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 46-49

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_accuracy_table
    res = test_accuracy_table(**data_params)





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

               ACC      AUC       F1 LogLoss   Brier
                                                
    Train   0.8756   0.9539   0.8722  0.2946  0.0889
    Test    0.8050   0.8920   0.8152  0.4262  0.1363
    Gap    -0.0706  -0.0619  -0.0570  0.1317  0.0474




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 50-51

Plot confusion matrix, ROC and Recall-Precision, only supports classifiers

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 51-54

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_accuracy_plot
    res = test_accuracy_plot(**data_params, figsize=(10, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_001.png
   :alt: Recall-Precision Curve, ROC Curve
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 55-56

Plot the prediction residuals against one feature of interest 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 56-59

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_accuracy_residual
    res = test_accuracy_residual(**data_params, show_feature='X1', figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_002.png
   :alt: Residual Plot
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 60-61

Run weakspot test to detect weak regions

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 61-64

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_weakspot
    res = test_weakspot(**data_params, slice_features=['X1'], figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_003.png
   :alt: Weak Regions
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 65-66

Run overfit test to detect overfit regions

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 66-69

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_overfit
    res = test_overfit(**data_params, slice_features=['X1'], figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_004.png
   :alt: Overfit Regions
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_004.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 70-71

Run reliability diagram 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 71-74

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_reliability_perf
    res = test_reliability_perf(**data_params, alpha=0.1, bins=10, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_005.png
   :alt: Reliability Diagram (Quantile Bins)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_005.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 75-76

Run reliability test to show the distributional distance between reliable and unreliable samples. 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 76-79

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_reliability_calibration
    res = test_reliability_calibration(**data_params, alpha=0.1, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_006.png
   :alt: Isotonic Regression
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_006.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 80-81

Run reliability test to show the average coverage of prediction intervals 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 81-84

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_reliability_table
    res = test_reliability_table(**data_params, alpha=0.1)





.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-script-out

 .. code-block:: none

      Original Calibrated
    0   0.1443     0.1475




.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 85-86

Run reliability test to show the distributional distance between reliable and unreliable samples. 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 86-89

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_reliability_distance
    res = test_reliability_distance(**data_params, alpha=0.1, threshold=1.1, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_007.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: Unreliable vs. Remaining Regions
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_007.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 90-91

Run reliability test to show relationship between prediction interval width and the feature of interest 

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 91-95

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_reliability_marginal
    res = test_reliability_marginal(**data_params, alpha=0.1, threshold=1.1, show_feature='X1',
                                    bins=10, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_008.png
   :alt: Marginal Uncertainty
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_008.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 96-97

Run resilience test to show how model performance changes under distributional shift.

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 97-100

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_resilience_perf
    res = test_resilience_perf(**data_params, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_009.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_009.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 101-102

Run resilience test to show the distributional distance between worst samples and remaining samples.

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 102-105

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_resilience_distance
    res = test_resilience_distance(**data_params, figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_010.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 10%-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_010.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 106-107

Run resilience test to show how model performance changes under distributional shift (density plot).

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 107-111

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_resilience_shift_density
    res = test_resilience_shift_density(**data_params, alpha=0.3, metric='AUC', show_feature='X1',
                                        figsize=(6, 5))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_011.png
   :alt: Distribution Shift: 30%-Worst vs Remaining
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_external/images/sphx_glr_plot_2_test_wo_model_cls_011.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 112-113

Run resilience test to show how model performance changes under distributional shift (histogram plot).

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 113-116

.. code-block:: default

    from piml.scored_test import test_resilience_shift_histogram
    res = test_resilience_shift_histogram(**data_params, alpha=0.3, metric='AUC', show_feature='X1',
                                          figsize=(6, 5))
